level.text: The Review Committee shall be comprised of five (5) persons who are sensitive to the needs of the community and who have some knowledge of energy-related activities. Comprehensive knowledge of energy shall not be necessary.
Members shall be appointed by the Director from a list developed by the Program Manager.
Each member of the Review Committee shall serve a one-year term. Vacancies shall be filled as they occur.
The Chairperson shall be chosen by the Review Committee members by majority vote.
The Review Committee shall meet quarterly or as often as necessary to hear requests for reconsideration and other business as it occurs.

The Review Committee shall screen all applications for grant funding and will submit comments and recommendation on applications and budgets to the Program Manager who, after review, shall transmit the recommendation to the Director for action.
